cachaca.title: Cachaça Tasting
cachaca.text: Discover the secrets of artisanal cachaça in one of Brazil’s most traditional regions. Taste exclusive varieties while learning about the production process.

capoeira.title: Capoeira Class
capoeira.text: Experience the energy of capoeira with renowned masters in Salvador. Learn the basic movements and the history of this unique martial art that blends dance, music, and sport.

regata.title: Regatta Sailing Tour
regata.text: Sail through the waters of Guanabara Bay aboard a regatta sailboat and admire stunning views of Rio de Janeiro from a whole new perspective.

iemanja.title: Offering to Iemanjá
iemanja.text: Take part in this sacred Afro-Brazilian ritual by offering gifts to the sea in honor of Iemanjá, the queen of the ocean. A deeply spiritual and cultural experience.

grafite.title: Graffiti Workshop
grafite.text: Join a workshop with local graffiti artists and learn the techniques behind the murals that color the world’s graffiti capital. In the end, leave your own mark on a collective panel.

cristo.title: Face to Face – Christ the Redeemer
cristo.text: Enjoy an unforgettable encounter with breathtaking panoramic views and a special moment to contemplate the unique energy of this place. A tour that blends faith, culture, and nature.

fantasias.title: Carnival Costume Making
fantasias.text: Go behind the scenes of Rio’s Carnival and create your own costume with artisans and designers. A vibrant experience full of sparkle, color, and creativity.

havaianas.title: Custom Havaianas Workshop
havaianas.text: Create personalized Havaianas featuring your company’s logo.

caipirinha.title: CAIPIRINHA WORKSHOP
caipirinha.text: Enjoy an exclusive experience where you’ll learn how to craft the traditional caipirinha using refined techniques and carefully selected ingredients.

video.title: Adventure and Beauty in a Regatta through Guanabara Bay
